entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
